item.title: The Philosophy of Freedom by Rudolph Steiner, Part 3
item.description: Send us comments, suggestions and ideas here! In this week’s episode Heka Astra brings us full circle to conclude this three part series concerning the philosophy and occult implications found within Rudolph Steiner’s Philosophy of Freedom. On the first side of the tape we discuss the philosophy of Monism and just how many concepts fit neatly inside of it and whether or not the world or life itself has a purpose. If so, where does it come from? In the extended show we wrap up all the loose e... Feed: https://feeds.buzzsprout.com/260316.rss

item.title: 461: Merge Conflict REACTS - 7 Programming Myths
item.description: We break down Fireship's 7 programming myths to see if we agree. Feed: https://www.mergeconflict.fm/rss
